Comments_List: I think I learned a lot of really important information to learn Spanish in this course.

I learned basic Spanish skills in this class. The class focused a lot on speaking, which had started out as a weakness of mine. With all that we did in class, I am definitely more confident in my Spanish speaking abilities now.
A lot of basic Spanish grammar and vocab
I learned a lot of Spanish (haha)
I think it is effective at teaching Spanish but the problem is that I think there is not enough time to grasp the grammar concepts well.

One major strength of the course was also a weakness: the class meets every day. I know that it's overall good for learning a language to meet every day, but it also made me less eager to go the the class every week day.
The professor can seem a little rough around the edges, but she's a good teacher and helps more if you ask specific questions.
I think it's actually a very good intro Spanish class, coming from someone with zero Spanish coming in.
Yes I would recommend this course.

I would recommend this course to another student if you feel you will use Spanish sometime in your life. If you feel like another language may be more suitable for you, try to evaluate which you would use more.
Yes but its a lot of work
Yes, because it's a good intro language class that went at a good pace for me.
